Product_Title: Kroger® Cocktail Shrimp with Sauce 25.2 oz
New Shrimp Title: Kroger® Cocktail Shrimp with Sauce
marketing:
60 count.
Peeled & deveined. Cooked in shell to seal flavor. Do not refreeze. The shrimp used in this product are farm-raised, harvested at the peak of freshness.
